title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.
fullDescription: This task management application helps teams organize and track their work efficiently. It includes features like task creation, assignment, due dates, comments, file attachments, and real-time updates. The app uses Firebase for real-time database and authentication, allowing team members to collaborate seamlessly and see changes as they happen.
